@chrisdarroch Sadly this is indeed a limitation in the @Bitbucket API. They already have a ticket in their issue tracker discussing this, but it seems to be going a little stale. Do you need to keep your repo in Bitbucket? Both @github and @gitlab support that feature. https://t.co/nhc5hqnfsT
